metadata.title: Publication metadata
metadata.description: Provides information about the publication and availability of the containing document.

back-matter.title: Back matter
back-matter.description: A collection of citations and resource references.

link.title: Link
link.description: A reference to a local or remote resource

href.title: hypertext reference
href.description: A link to a document or document fragment (actual, nominal or projected)

rel.title: Relation
rel.description: Describes the type of relationship provided by the link. This can be an indicator of the link's purpose.

media-type.title: Media type
media-type.description: Describes the media type of the linked resource

published.title: Publication Timestamp
published.description: The date and time this document was published.

last-modified.title: Last modified timestamp
last-modified.description: Date and time of last modification.

version.title: Document version
version.description: The version of the document content.

doc-id.title: Document Identifier
doc-id.description: A document identifier qualified by an identifier type.

type.description: Qualifies the kind of document identifier.

prop.title: Property
prop.description: A value with a name, attributed to the containing control, part, or group.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

class.title: Class
class.description: Indicating the type or classification of the containing object

annotation.title: Annotation
annotation.description: A name/value pair with optional explanitory remarks.

name.title: Name
name.description: Identifying the purpose and intended use of the property, part or other object.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

value.title: Value
value.description: Indicates the value of the characteristic.

party.title: Party (organization or person)
party.description: A responsible entity, either singular (an organization or person) or collective (multiple persons)

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

party-id.title: Party Reference
party-id.description: References a party defined in metadata.

org.title: Organization
org.description: An organization or legal entity (not a person), with contact information

person-id.title: Personal Identifier
person-id.description: An identifier for a person (such as an ORCID) using a designated scheme.

type.title: Type
type.description: Indicating the type of identifier, address, email or other data item.

org-id.title: Organization Identifier
org-id.description: An identifier for an organization using a designated scheme.

type.title: Type
type.description: Indicating the type of identifier, address, email or other data item.

rlink.title: Resource link
rlink.description: A pointer to an external copy of a document with optional hash for verification

href.title: hypertext reference
href.description: A link to a document or document fragment (actual, nominal or projected)

media-type.title: Media type
media-type.description: Describes the media type of the linked resource

short-name.title: short-name
short-name.description: A common name, short name or acronym

addr-line.title: Address line
addr-line.description: A single line of an address.

city.title: City
city.description: City, town or geographical region for mailing address

state.title: State
state.description: State, province or analogous geographical region for mailing address

postal-code.title: Postal Code
postal-code.description: Postal or ZIP code for mailing address

type.description: Indicates the type of phone number.

url.title: URL
url.description: URL for web site or Internet presence

resource.title: Resource
resource.description: A resource associated with the present document.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

hash.title: Hash
hash.description: A representation of a cryptographic digest generated over a resource using a hash algorithm.

algorithm.title: Hash algorithm
algorithm.description: Method by which a hash is derived

role.title: Role
role.description: Defining a role to be assigned to a party

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

responsible-party.title: Responsible Party
responsible-party.description: A reference to a set of organizations or persons that have responsibility for performing a referenced role relative to the parent context.

title.title: Title
title.description: A title for display and navigation

filename.title: File Name
filename.description: Name of the file before it was encoded as Base64 to be embedded in a resource. This is the name that will be assigned to the file when the file is decoded.

media-type.title: Media type
media-type.description: Describes the media type of the linked resource

citation.title: Citation
citation.description: A citation to resources, either external or internal (by means of internal cross-reference).

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

target.title: Citation target
target.description: An address for retrieval of a citation

remarks.title: Remarks
remarks.description: Additional commentary on the parent item.

param.title: Parameter
param.description: Parameters provide a mechanism for the dynamic assignment of value(s) in a control.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

class.title: Class
class.description: Indicating the type or classification of the containing object

label.title: Parameter label
label.description: A placeholder for a missing value, in display.

usage.title: Parameter description
usage.description: Indicates and explains the purpose and use of a parameter

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

constraint.title: Constraint
constraint.description: A formal or informal expression of a constraint or test

test.title: Constraint test
test.description: A formal (executable) expression of a constraint

guideline.title: Guideline
guideline.description: A prose statement that provides a recommendation for the use of a parameter.

value.title: Value constraint
value.description: Indicates a permissible value for a parameter or property

how-many.title: Cardinality
how-many.description: When selecting, a requirement such as one or more

choice.title: Choice
choice.description: A value selection among several such options

part.title: Part
part.description: A partition or component of a control or part

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

name.title: Name
name.description: Identifying the purpose and intended use of the property, part or other object.

class.title: Class
class.description: Indicating the type or classification of the containing object

prose.title: Prose
prose.description: Prose permits multiple paragraphs, lists, tables etc.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Each OSCAL profile is defined by a Profile element

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

import.title: Import resource
import.description: An Import element designates a catalog, profile, or other resource to be included (referenced and potentially modified) by this profile.

href.title: hypertext reference
href.description: A link to a document or document fragment (actual, nominal or projected)

merge.title: Merge controls
merge.description: A Merge element merges controls in resolution.

combine.title: Combination rule
combine.description: A Combine element defines whether and how to combine multiple (competing) versions of the same control

method.title: Combination method
method.description: How clashing controls should be handled

as-is.title: As is
as-is.description: An As-is element indicates that the controls should be structured in resolution as they are structured in their source catalogs. It does not contain any elements or attributes.

custom.title: Custom grouping
custom.description: A Custom element frames a structure for embedding represented controls in resolution.

group.title: Control group
group.description: As in catalogs, a group of (selected) controls or of groups of controls

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

class.title: Class
class.description: Indicating the type or classification of the containing object

modify.title: Modify controls
modify.description: Set parameters or amend controls in resolution

include.title: Include controls
include.description: Specifies which controls to include from the resource (source catalog) being imported

all.title: Include all
all.description: Include all controls from the imported resource (catalog)

with-child-controls.title: Include contained controls with control
with-child-controls.description: When a control is included, whether its child (dependent) controls are also included.

call.title: Call
call.description: Call a control by its ID

control-id.title: Control ID
control-id.description: Value of the 'id' flag on a target control

with-child-controls.title: Include contained controls with control
with-child-controls.description: When a control is included, whether its child (dependent) controls are also included.

match.title: Match controls by identifier
match.description: Select controls by (regular expression) match on ID

pattern.title: Pattern
pattern.description: A regular expression matching the IDs of one or more controls to be selected

order.title: Order
order.description: A designation of how a selection of controls in a profile is to be ordered.

with-child-controls.title: Include contained controls with control
with-child-controls.description: When a control is included, whether its child (dependent) controls are also included.

exclude.title: Exclude controls
exclude.description: Which controls to exclude from the resource (source catalog) being imported

set.title: Parameter Setting
set.description: A parameter setting, to be propagated to points of insertion

class.title: Class
class.description: Indicating the type or classification of the containing object

alter.title: Alteration
alter.description: An Alter element specifies changes to be made to an included control when a profile is resolved.

control-id.title: Control ID
control-id.description: Value of the 'id' flag on a target control

remove.title: Removal
remove.description: Specifies elements to be removed from a control, in resolution

name-ref.title: References by (assigned) name
name-ref.description: Items to remove, by assigned name

class-ref.title: References by class
class-ref.description: Items to remove, by class. A token match.

id-ref.title: References by ID
id-ref.description: Items to remove, indicated by their IDs

item-name.title: References by item name or generic identifier
item-name.description: Items to remove, by the name of the item's type, or generic identifier, e.g. title or prop

add.title: Addition
add.description: Specifies contents to be added into controls, in resolution

position.title: Position
position.description: Where to add the new content with respect to the targeted element (beside it or inside it)
